snippet.title: Cuisineer - Official Console Announce Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Join developer BattleBrew Productions for a deep dive into the new features you can expect from Cuisineer's console release, including the new weapon class, new buffs, new in-game events, and more for this roguelite dungeon crawler and restaurant simulator game. Cuisineer will be available on PS5, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox Series X/S on January 28, 2025. It is already available on PC. Explore a lush world and defeat monsters with your trusty spatula and some boba tea, then gather delicious ingredients and bring them home to cook and serve at your restaurant!
